isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - REMOVE - AIR SHIFT UNIT OF THE INTER-AXLE DIFFERENTIAL LOCK

svcproc.title: AIR SHIFT UNIT OF THE INTER-AXLE DIFFERENTIAL LOCK

svcsubproc.title: Air Applied and Spring Release Models (Standard) ( Figure 24)

figure.caption: Figure 24. Air Applied and Spring Release Models (Standard)

step1.para: On flange-type cylinders, remove the bolts that fasten the cylinder to the carrier. Remove the cylinder.
On threaded cylinders, remove the cylinder.
Remove the piston from the shift shaft.

note.para: If the shift shaft cannot be removed by hand, remove the adjusting bolt and the jam nut. Put a brass drift through the hole for the adjusting bolt against the rear of the shift shaft. Use a hammer on the brass drift to remove the shift shaft. Inspect the shift shaft for damage.

step1.para: Remove the shift shaft from the differential carrier. When the shift shaft is removed, the fork and the spring may fall.
From the input shaft bore, remove the the collar, the fork, and the spring. If necessary, remove the jam nut and the adjusting bolt.

svcsubproc.title: Spring Applied and Air Release Models (Optional) ( Figure 25)

figure.caption: Figure 25. Spring Applied and Air Release Models (Optional)

step1.para: Remove the two bolts and washers that fasten the cover to the cylinder. Remove the cover.
Remove the spring from the end of the shift shaft.
Remove the snap ring from the end of the shift shaft.
Remove the piston from the cylinder. Inspect the O-rings for wear and damage. Replace as required.

note.para: If the shift shaft cannot be removed by hand, remove adjusting bolt and the jam nut. Put a brass drift through the hole for the adjusting bolt against the rear of the shift shaft. Use a hammer on the brass drift to remove the shift shaft. Inspect the shift shaft for damage.

step1.para: Remove the shift shaft from the carrier. When shaft is removed, the fork may fall.
If necessary, remove the jam nut and the adjusting bolt.
